title: Lynda - Pixel Playground with Bert Monroy
description:
Lynda - Pixel Playground with Bert Monroy
9h 46m Intermediate, Updated Sep 26, 2014 | Uploaded in Sept 30, 2014 by 2boweb

Software: Illustrator Photoshop 

Tags : Design Illustration, Photography, Design Techniques, Digital Painting 

Take a 10-minute recess every week and join Bert Monroy in Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator, the playgrounds of digital artists. Every Friday Bert walks through a fun, self-contained project that tests your skills and challenges the imagination. These programs aren't just image editors; they are sandboxes for creativity and experimentation. Take a spin through a carousel of tools and get reinspired, each and every week.
